member.name: T:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AccountActivity
member.summary: (Restricted Access) Contains a signal helping apps differentiating between likely genuine and likely non-genuine user traffic.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AccountActivity.ActivityLevel
member.summary: Required. Indicates the activity level of the account.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AccountDetails
member.summary: Contains the account information such as the licensing status for the user in the scope.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AccountDetails.AccountActivity
member.summary: (Restricted Access) Details about the account activity for the user in the scope.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AccountDetails.AppLicensingVerdict
member.summary: Required. Details about the licensing status of the user for the app in the scope.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AppIntegrity.AppRecognitionVerdict
member.summary: Required. Details about the app recognition verdict

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AppIntegrity.CertificateSha256Digest
member.summary: The SHA256 hash of the requesting app's signing certificates (base64 web-safe encoded). Set iff app_recognition_verdict != UNEVALUATED.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AppIntegrity.PackageName
member.summary: Package name of the application under attestation. Set iff app_recognition_verdict != UNEVALUATED.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.AppIntegrity.VersionCode
member.summary: Version code of the application. Set iff app_recognition_verdict != UNEVALUATED.

member.summary: Request to decode the integrity token.

member.summary: Response containing the decoded integrity payload.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.DecodeIntegrityTokenResponse.TokenPayloadExternal
member.summary: Plain token payload generated from the decoded integrity token.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.DeviceIntegrity.DeviceRecognitionVerdict
member.summary: Details about the integrity of the device the app is running on.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.GuidanceDetails
member.summary: Contains guidance details about the Integrity API response, providing additional context to the integrity verdicts.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.GuidanceDetails.UserRemediationDetails
member.summary: This shows when there is an issue with at least one of the integrity verdicts, which can be remedied by the user and provides additional details.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.RequestDetails.Nonce
member.summary: Nonce that was provided in the request (which is base64 web-safe no-wrap).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.RequestDetails.RequestHash
member.summary: Request hash that was provided in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.RequestDetails.RequestPackageName
member.summary: Required. Application package name this attestation was requested for. Note: This field makes no guarantees or promises on the caller integrity. For details on application integrity, check application_integrity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.RequestDetails.TimestampMillis
member.summary: Required. Timestamp, in milliseconds, of the integrity application request.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TestingDetails
member.summary: Contains additional information generated for testing responses.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TestingDetails.IsTestingResponse
member.summary: Required. Indicates that the information contained in this payload is a testing response that is statically overridden for a tester.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal
member.summary: Contains basic app information and integrity signals like device attestation and licensing details.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.AccountDetails
member.summary: Required. Details about the Play Store account.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.AppIntegrity
member.summary: Required. Details about the application integrity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.DeviceIntegrity
member.summary: Required. Details about the device integrity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.GuidanceDetails
member.summary: Additional guidance related to the integrity API response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.RequestDetails
member.summary: Required. Details about the integrity request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.PlayIntegrity.v1.Data.TokenPayloadExternal.TestingDetails
member.summary: Indicates that this payload is generated for testing purposes and contains any additional data that is linked with testing status.
